00256 template <class Etype>
00257 Vector<Etype>::Vector ( UINT initialCapacity, UINT capacityIncrement ) {
00258 
00259     m_size = 0;
00260     m_capacity = initialCapacity;
00261     m_pData = new Etype* [ m_capacity ];
00262     m_increment = capacityIncrement;
00263 
00264 } // end Vector

00267 template <class Etype>
00268 Vector<Etype>::Vector ( const Vector<Etype>& rhv ) {
00269 
00270     UINT i;
00271 
00272     m_size = rhv.m_size;
00273     m_capacity = rhv.m_capacity;
00274     m_pData = new Etype* [ m_capacity ];
00275     m_increment = rhv.m_increment;
00276 
00277     for ( i = 0; i < m_size; i++ ) {
00278         m_pData[i] = new Etype ( * ( rhv.m_pData[i] ) );
00279     }
00280 
00281 } // end Vector

00288     delete [] m_pData;

00300 bool Vector<Etype>::contains ( const Etype& elem ) const {
00301 
00302     UINT i;
00303     
00304     for ( i = 0; i < m_size; i++ ) {
00305         if ( *m_pData[i] == elem )
00306             return true;
00307     }
00308 
00309     return false;
00310 
00311 } // end contains

00334 template <class Etype>
00335 const Etype & Vector<Etype>::firstElement () const {
00336 
00337     if ( m_size == 0 ) {
00338         // Throw "Empty Vector Exception".
00339         std::string logMessage = " > [ERROR VECTOR] Method firstElement() has been called on empty Vector. \n ";
00340         Utils::logWarningError ( logMessage );
00341         exit ( 1 );
00342     }
00343 
00344     return *m_pData[0];
00345     
00346 } // end firstElement

00350 int Vector<Etype>::indexOf ( const Etype& elem ) const {
00351 
00352     UINT i;
00353 
00354     for ( i = 0; i < m_size; i++ ) {
00355         if ( *m_pData[i] == elem )
00356             return i;
00357     }
00358 
00359     return -1;
00360 
00361 } // end indexOf

00365 bool Vector<Etype>::isEmpty () const {
00366     return m_size == 0;

00370 template <class Etype>
00371 const Etype & Vector<Etype>::lastElement () const {
00372 
00373     if ( m_size == 0 ) {
00374         // Throw "Empty Vector Exception".
00375         std::cerr << " lastElement() called on empty Vector " << std::endl;
00376         exit ( 1 );
00377     }
00378 
00379     return *m_pData[ m_size - 1 ];
00380     
00381 } // end lastElement

00383 
00384 template <class Etype>
00385 int Vector<Etype>::lastIndexOf ( const Etype& elem ) const {
00386     
00387     // Check for empty vector.
00388     if ( m_size == 0 )
00389         return -1;
00390 
00391     UINT i = m_size;
00392 
00393     do {
00394         i -= 1;
00395         if ( *m_pData[i] == elem )
00396             return i;
00397     }
00398     
00399     while ( i != 0 );
00400     return -1;
00401     
00402 } // end lastIndexOf

00411 template <class Etype>
00412 void Vector<Etype>::addElement ( const Etype& obj ) {
00413 
00414     if ( m_size == m_capacity )
00415         ensureCapacity ( m_capacity + m_increment );
00416 
00417     m_pData[ m_size ++ ] = new Etype ( obj );
00418 
00419 } // end addElement
00420 
00421 
00422 template <class Etype>
00423 void Vector<Etype>::ensureCapacity ( UINT minCapacity ) {
00424 
00425     if ( minCapacity > m_capacity ) {
00426         UINT i;
00427         m_capacity = minCapacity;
00428 
00429         Etype** temp = new Etype* [ m_capacity ];
00430 
00431         // Copy all the elements over upto newsize.
00432         for ( i = 0; i < m_size; i++ )
00433             temp[i] = m_pData[i];
00434 
00435         delete [] m_pData;
00436         m_pData = temp;
00437     }
00438     
00439 } // end ensureCapacity
00440 
00441 
00442 template <class Etype>
00443 void Vector<Etype>::insertElementAt ( const Etype& obj, UINT index ) {
00444 
00445     UINT i;
00446 
00447     verifyIndex ( index );    // This will throw if true.
00448 
00449     if ( m_size == m_capacity )
00450         ensureCapacity ( m_capacity + m_increment );
00451 
00452     Etype* newItem = new Etype ( obj );    // Pointer to new item.
00453     Etype* tmp;                            // Temp to hold item to be moved over.
00454 
00455     for ( i = index; i <= m_size; i++ ) {
00456         tmp = m_pData[i];
00457         m_pData[i] = newItem;
00458 
00459         if ( i != m_size )
00460             newItem = tmp;
00461         else
00462             break;
00463     }
00464 
00465     m_size ++;
00466     
00467 } // end insertElementAt

00470 template <class Etype>
00471 void Vector<Etype>::removeAllElements () {
00472 
00473     UINT i;
00474 
00475     // Avoid memory leak.
00476     for ( i = 0; i < m_size; i++ )
00477         delete m_pData[i];
00478 
00479     m_size = 0;
00480     
00481 } // end removeAllElements
00482 
00483 
00484 template <class Etype>
00485 bool Vector<Etype>::removeElement ( const Etype& obj ) {
00486 
00487     UINT i;
00488 
00489     for ( i = 0; i < m_size; i++ ) {
00490         if ( *m_pData[i] == obj ) {
00491             removeElementAt ( i );
00492             return true;
00493         }
00494     }
00495 
00496     return false;
00497 
00498 } // end removeElement
00499 
00500 
00501 template <class Etype>
00502 void Vector<Etype>::removeElementAt ( UINT index ) {
00503 
00504     UINT i;
00505 
00506     verifyIndex ( index );
00507     delete m_pData[ index ];
00508     for ( i = index + 1; i < m_size; i++ )
00509         m_pData[ i - 1 ] = m_pData[i];
00510 
00511     m_size--;
00512     
00513 } // end removeElementAt
00514 
00515 
00516 template <class Etype>
00517 void Vector<Etype>::removeElementAtWithoutDestroyingElement ( UINT index ) {
00518 
00519     UINT i;
00520 
00521     verifyIndex ( index );
00522 
00523     for ( i = index + 1; i < m_size; i++ )
00524         m_pData[ i - 1 ] = m_pData[i];
00525 
00526     m_size--;
00527 
00528 } // end removeElementAtWithoutDestroyingElement

00531 template <class Etype>
00532 void Vector<Etype>::setElementAt ( const Etype& obj, UINT index ) {
00533 
00534     verifyIndex ( index );
00535     *m_pData[ index ] = obj;
00536 
00537 } // end setElementAt

00540 template <class Etype>
00541 void Vector<Etype>::setSize ( UINT newSize ) {
00542 
00543     UINT i;
00544 
00545     if ( newSize > m_capacity )
00546         ensureCapacity ( newSize );
00547     else if ( newSize < m_size ) {
00548         for ( i = newSize; i < m_size; i++ )
00549             delete m_pData[i];
00550 
00551         m_size = newSize;
00552     }
00553     
00554 } // end setSize
00555 
00556 
00557 template <class Etype>
00558 void Vector<Etype>::trimToSize () {
00559 
00560     if ( m_size != m_capacity ) {
00561         Etype** temp = new Etype* [ m_size ];
00562         UINT i;
00563 
00564         for ( i = 0; i < m_size; i++ )
00565             temp[i] = m_pData[i];
00566 
00567         delete [] m_pData;
00568         m_pData = temp;
00569         m_capacity = m_size;
00570     }
00571 
00572 } // end trimToSize

00574 
00575 template <class Etype>
00576 int Vector<Etype>::min ( UINT left, UINT right ) const {
00577     return left < right ? left : right;
00578 } // end min

00581 template <class Etype>
00582 void Vector<Etype>::verifyIndex ( UINT index ) const {
00583     
00584     if ( index >= m_capacity ) {
00585         std::cerr << "Index out of bounds";
00586         exit ( 1 );
00587     
00588     }
00589 
00590 } // end verifyIndex

00592 
00593 template <class Etype>
00594 bool Vector<Etype>::operator == ( const Vector<Etype>& rhv ) {
00595 
00596     UINT i;
00597 
00598     if ( m_size != rhv.m_size ) return false;
00599 
00600     for ( i = 0; i < m_size; i++ ) {
00601         if ( *m_pData[i] != * ( rhv.m_pData[i] ) ) return false;
00602     }
00603 
00604     return true;
00605 
00606 } // end operator ==

00609 template <class Etype>
00610 const Etype & Vector<Etype>::operator [] ( UINT index ) const {
00611     return elementAt ( index );
